history.title: ABOUT Cowboys Casino
history.description2: Cowboys Casino is a modern entertainment venue in the city center. Guests enjoy a variety of gaming options and a stylish atmosphere. The casino offers slots, table games, and poker for thrill-seekers. Spacious halls provide comfort and convenience. Inside, there is a bar and restaurant for a pleasant experience. Tournaments and special events are held regularly.
history.description3: The vibe combines gaming and nightlife. It’s a destination for those who love excitement. Cowboys Casino blends play, relaxation, and fun. Everyone can find entertainment to suit their taste.

customHtml.title: Cowboy Energy in the Heart of Calgary
customHtml.description:
Cowboys Casino is more than just a casino — it’s a modern tribute to the Wild West spirit. With cowboy hats, sculptures, themed decor, and even security staff in ten-gallon hats, the venue offers a festive and adventurous atmosphere. It’s where gaming meets entertainment, with live shows, dancing, and vibrant nightlife turning any evening into a memorable experience.


The casino is open daily from 9:30 AM to 5:00 AM, making it accessible almost around the clock. This is perfect for those looking to continue the fun after attending events at Calgary Stampede, Scotiabank Saddledome, or other downtown attractions. Located in Victoria Park, Cowboys Casino sits at the heart of Calgary’s cultural district.


Inside, guests will find several bars and restaurants, including Centre Bar & Eatery, Hitman's Bar, Melrose, and Second Son. Each venue offers its own vibe and menu — from cocktails to full meals. All Day Happy Hour and food discounts make the experience even more enjoyable.


While the casino doesn’t have its own hotel, there are plenty of nearby options. Within walking distance are Ramada Plaza, Fairfield Inn & Suites, and HI Calgary for budget travelers, and the stylish Hotel Arts with a pool and free bikes for those seeking comfort and flair.


Cowboys Casino hosts regular events, parties, themed shows, and tournaments. It’s a place to play and celebrate. The Winner’s Edge loyalty program lets players earn rewards, join promotions, and access exclusive offers. For guests aged 55 and older, the Elite 55 daytime program offers extra perks and benefits.


Cowboys Casino is the perfect destination for those seeking thrill, style, and a true celebration vibe. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned player, a tourist or a local, there’s something for everyone here.


Comfort and Convenience: How Cowboys Casino Welcomes Guests

At Cowboys Casino, guest service and accessibility are top priorities. The primary language spoken by staff is English, in line with Canadian standards. However, many employees are trained to assist international visitors and can communicate in basic French and Spanish. Courtesy, friendliness, and a willingness to help are key elements of the casino’s welcoming atmosphere.


In terms of payment, the casino accepts both cash and major credit cards. Guests can use Visa and Mastercard for deposits and withdrawals, making transactions smooth and convenient. Slot machines operate with bills and vouchers rather than coins, reflecting modern gaming practices.


Cowboys Casino is equipped with ATMs that dispense Canadian dollars, and currency exchange services are available at the cashier desk. This is especially helpful for international tourists who need to convert their money safely and efficiently. Staff are available to assist with current rates and secure transactions.


The casino also features bonus programs and the Winner’s Edge loyalty system. Members enjoy special offers, free spins, access to exclusive events, and the ability to earn points with every game. This adds extra value to the entertainment experience.


Preparing for Your Visit to Cowboys Casino

Visiting Cowboys Casino is not just about gaming — it’s about enjoying a stylish and comfortable experience. The casino maintains a moderate dress code: guests are asked to avoid clothing with profanity, crude images, or overly revealing outfits. This helps ensure a respectful and enjoyable environment for everyone.


To enter the casino, guests must present original government-issued photo ID with a birth date and unique identifier. Digital copies or photos of documents are not accepted. The minimum age for entry is 18. Backpacks and large bags are not allowed on the casino floor and must be checked at the coat check, which is complimentary outside peak hours.


Bringing outside alcohol, illegal substances, or weapons is strictly prohibited. Security staff may inspect bags and deny entry if a guest refuses a check. These measures are in place to ensure the safety of all visitors.


Cowboys Casino is easily accessible by car or public transit. It offers free heated underground parking for vehicles under 6 feet 1 inch in height. If a guest is unable to drive safely, they are encouraged to leave their vehicle overnight and retrieve it within 24 hours. The Victoria Park C-Train station is just a five-minute walk from the casino.


In short, Cowboys Casino prioritizes comfort, safety, and accessibility. By following a few simple rules, guests can enjoy a welcoming and exciting atmosphere.


Dress Code

  • • No profanity or crude images
  • • No overly revealing clothing

Entry Requirements

  • • Original photo ID
  • • Age 18+
  • • No backpacks or large bags

Prohibited Items

  • • Outside alcohol
  • • Illegal substances and weapons
  • • Refusal of bag check = denied entry

Parking & Transit

  • • Free heated underground parking
  • • Overnight parking allowed
  • • Close to C-Train station

Winner’s Edge: Rewards, Points & Perks for Loyal Guests

The Winner’s Edge loyalty program is Alberta’s province-wide casino rewards system, available at Cowboys Casino. It’s designed to make every visit more exciting and rewarding. Membership is completely free, and registration takes just a few minutes. Once registered, you receive a personalized card that lets you earn points every time you play slots or electronic table games.


Points are earned at a rate of 1 point per $1–$5 played, and can be redeemed for Free Play — 1,000 points = $1 CAD — or used to enter exclusive contests and prize draws. Members also receive a 10% discount on food and beverages (excluding alcohol) at all Alberta casinos. The program includes regular promotions, bonus point events, VIP experiences, and special offers.


For guests aged 55+, there’s a dedicated daytime program called Elite 55, which includes lunch specials, slot tournaments, and themed events. While Winner’s Edge doesn’t have fixed tiers, active players gain access to more personalized offers and higher-value rewards.


Winner’s Edge Benefits

  • • Free registration
  • • 1 point per $1–$5 played
  • • 1,000 points = $1 Free Play
  • • 10% discount on food & drinks
  • • Access to exclusive contests and VIP events
  • • Special bonuses and gifts
  • • Elite 55 program for guests 55+

Bonuses & Levels

  • • Welcome bonus up to 500,000 points
  • • Extra points during promotions
  • • Personalized offers for active players

How to join

  • • At a casino kiosk
  • • At Guest Services with valid ID

Participation Requirements

  • • Age 18+
  • • Play slots or electronic table games
  • • Use your card every time you play

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Cowboys Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses & Events at Cowboys Casino

Cowboys Casino offers more than just games — it’s a hub of bonuses, promotions, and seasonal events that make every visit exciting. From cash draws to themed parties and tournaments, the casino creates a dynamic experience where fun and winnings go hand in hand.


Progressive jackpots on slot machines include Diamond Millions, starting at $1 million CAD and growing with every spin. Fixed jackpots range from $4,000 to $100,000 CAD, and poker players can enjoy high-hand bonuses and regular tournaments with cash prizes.


The online platform features a welcome bonus of up to $750 + 200 free spins, making it one of the most generous in Canada. Weekly promotions, VIP rewards, and cashback offers keep the excitement going for digital players.

Seasonal events include Calgary Stampede parties, New Year’s Eve shows, sports viewing nights, and live concerts at Cowboys Dance Hall. These events turn the casino into a celebration zone, blending gaming with music, dancing, and themed contests.


Gaming Bonuses & Wins:

  • • Diamond Millions: jackpot from $1,000,000 CAD
  • • Jackpot Junction: from $100,000 CAD
  • • American Original: from $4,000 CAD
  • • High-hand poker bonuses
  • • Cash prize tournaments

Online Bonuses

  • • Welcome bonus: up to $750 + 200 free spins
  • • Weekly promos and VIP rewards
  • • Cashback and exclusive offers

Seasonal Events & Entertainment

  • • Calgary Stampede party nights
  • • New Year’s Eve shows and giveaways
  • • Sports viewing parties
  • • Live concerts and dancing at Cowboys Dance Hall

Games Guests Love at Cowboys Casino

Cowboys Casino offers a wide variety of games that appeal to both beginners and seasoned players. Slot machines are a major attraction, with over 370 options including classic reels, video slots, and progressive jackpots. Popular titles include Buffalo Gold, Wheel of Fortune, and Dragon Link, with big wins like Diamond Millions, starting at $1,000,000 CAD.


Table games are well represented, featuring blackjack, roulette, baccarat, craps, Ultimate Texas Hold’em, Three Card Poker, and EZ Baccarat. For high rollers, the High Limit Room offers elevated stakes and a more private setting.


Poker is a highlight, with a dedicated 12-table poker room hosting daily cash games and regular tournaments. Variants include No Limit Texas Hold’em and Pot Limit Omaha, with high-hand bonuses and bad beat jackpots available.


For digital gaming fans, the Digital Pit features electronic versions of table games like blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and craps — all in a sleek, immersive environment.


Slot Machines

  • • 370+ slots
  • • Buffalo Gold, Wheel of Fortune, Dragon Link
  • • Diamond Millions — jackpot from $1,000,000 CAD
  • • Jackpot Junction — from $100,000 CAD
  • • American Original — from $4,000 CAD

Table Games

  • • Blackjack, roulette, baccarat, craps
  • • Ultimate Texas Hold’em, Three Card Poker
  • • EZ Baccarat
  • • High Limit Room — bets from $1 to $5

Poker

  • • 12 tables
  • • No Limit Texas Hold’em, Pot Limit Omaha
  • • Daily cash games and tournaments
  • • High-hand bonuses and bad beat jackpots

Digital Gaming

  • • Digital Pit — 20+ terminals
  • • Electronic blackjack, roulette, baccarat, craps
  • • Comfortable seating and large screens

Betting Limits at Cowboys Casino: From Casual to High Stakes

Cowboys Casino offers flexible betting limits suitable for casual players and high rollers alike. Slot machines start at $0.01 CAD and go up to $5 CAD per spin. Table games like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat have minimum bets from $5 CAD, while the High Limit Room starts at $25 CAD. Digital terminals offer bets from $1 CAD, and VLTs begin at $8.80 CAD.

This range makes the casino accessible to students, tourists, and seasoned gamblers. Flexible limits allow players to manage their bankroll and choose games that match their comfort level.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines $0.01 CAD $5 CAD
Blackjack (regular) $5 CAD $100+ CAD
Blackjack (High Limit) $25 CAD $500+ CAD
Roulette $5 CAD $100+ CAD
Baccarat $5 CAD $250+ CAD
Poker (cash games) $1/2 CAD No limit
Digital Terminals $1 CAD $50+ CAD
VLTs $8.80 CAD $100+ CAD

Unlimited Fun: Shows & Parties at Cowboys Casino

Cowboys Casino is more than a gaming venue — it’s a full-scale entertainment hub that blends nightlife, music, shows, and festivals. At its core is the Cowboys Dance Hall, Calgary’s largest nightclub, known for its country and pop-themed parties, live concerts, and weekly DJ events. It’s the go-to spot for high-energy nights with dancing, music, and special performances.


One of the biggest annual highlights is the Cowboys Music Festival, held during the Calgary Stampede. For 10 days, the casino hosts massive concerts, outdoor parties, themed events, and performances by global artists. The iconic Cowboys Tent draws thousands of guests for a true Western-style celebration with music and dancing.


For those who enjoy interactive fun, Cowboys Casino has recently added an arcade with 24 game machines, offering both classic and modern titles. It’s a great way to kick off the evening, especially for guests arriving early. The arcade caters to a wide age range — from 18 to 80


In addition, Cowboys Casino regularly hosts sports screenings, holiday parties, corporate events, charity shows, and live concerts. Spacious venues, advanced lighting, LED walls, and high-quality sound make every event memorable. The casino also offers event booking services for birthdays, bachelorette parties, and company gatherings.


Cowboys Casino Entertainment Highlights

  • • Cowboys Dance Hall — Calgary’s largest nightclub with country/pop parties
  • • Cowboys Music Festival — 10-day concert and party series during Stampede
  • • Cowboys Tent — massive outdoor venue with live music and dancing
  • • Arcade — 24 machines with classic and modern games
  • • Sports Screenings — on large HD screens in bar and lounge
  • • Themed Parties — Halloween, New Year’s, Canada Day, and more
  • • Private & Corporate Events — with full booking services
  • • Live Concerts & DJ Sets — weekly entertainment
  • • Charity Events & Shows — in partnership with local organizations

Where to Relax at Cowboys Casino: Dining, Drinks & Comfort

Cowboys Casino isn’t just about gaming and shows — it’s a full experience with great food, stylish bars, and nearby hotels for a comfortable stay. At the heart of the casino is the Centre Bar & Eatery, an open-concept bar and restaurant where guests can enjoy breakfast (9:30–11:00 AM), Canadian cuisine, and drinks throughout the day. Large screens show sports games, and the lively atmosphere makes it a perfect spot to unwind between rounds.


For nightlife lovers, the Cowboys Dance Hall is Calgary’s largest nightclub, located right within the casino. It hosts parties, concerts, themed shows, and corporate events — ideal for continuing the night after gaming or just dancing to live music.


If you’re staying overnight, there are many hotels within walking distance. Top choices include Hotel Arts, Le Germain Hotel, Hyatt Regency, Calgary Marriott Downtown, and Fairfield Inn & Suites. All offer comfortable rooms, breakfast, fitness centers, and even spa services, just 5–10 minutes from the casino.


The casino also provides event booking services — from birthdays to corporate gatherings. Spacious venues, modern lighting, and professional staff make organizing celebrations easy and enjoyable. And if you just want to relax, lounge areas offer a quiet space to sip a drink and enjoy the vibe.


Places to Eat, Stay & Relax

  • • Centre Bar & Eatery — central bar & restaurant, breakfast, lunch, sports screens
  • • Cowboys Dance Hall — nightclub with live music, parties & shows
  • • Hotel Arts — stylish hotel with pool & restaurant, 0.7 km from casino
  • • Le Germain Hotel — designer hotel downtown, 0.8 km from casino
  • • Calgary Marriott Downtown — comfort & city views, 0.7 km from casino
  • • Hyatt Regency — spacious rooms, spa & dining, 0.8 km from casino
  • • Fairfield Inn & Suites — convenient hotel near Stampede Grounds, 0.9 km
  • • Lounge Areas — quiet spaces to relax between games
  • • Event Booking Services — for birthdays, corporate events & private parties

items.title: Is there an entry fee to the casino?
items.answer: No, entry to Cowboys Casino is free for all guests aged 18+ with valid ID.

items.title: Can I take photos or videos inside the casino?
items.answer: Photography is allowed in public areas but prohibited in gaming zones and the poker room. Event filming requires management approval.

items.title: Can I reserve a VIP area or table?
items.answer: Yes, VIP lounges, tables, and seating can be reserved via the casino’s website or phone. Advance booking is recommended, especially on weekends and holidays.

items.title: Is there a dress code for Cowboys Dance Hall?
items.answer: Yes, the club enforces a moderate dress code: no athletic wear, beachwear, or offensive clothing.
